name: Ley Line Disorder: Dire Echoes
description: End Phase: For each one of your characters downed during this Round, all of your remaining character(s) will gain 2 Shield points (Can stack, max 4 points) and permanently deal +1 DMG (Can stack, max +2 DMG).
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> For each one of your characters downed during this Round, all of your remaining character(s) will gain 2 Shield points (Can stack, max 4 points) and permanently deal +1 DMG (Can stack, max +2 DMG).
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> For each one of your characters downed during this Round, all of your remaining character(s) will gain 2 Shield points (Can stack, max 4 points) and permanently deal +1 DMG (Can stack, max +2 DMG).
